name: places/ChIJlWFsZq9ZwokRgjGCyjVuKps
formattedAddress: 104 W 29th St #4, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 104 W 29th St #4, New York, NY 10001-5310, USA

originalText.text:
I volenteered for  the 14th  annual media awards several years back. I gave them my address, and my address was giving to an enemy of mine to issue a cease and desist letter. I asked why did they give my address out. They replied saying I didnt say it was confidential.
All staff or volunteer addresses should be confidential.  I tried to settle this issue, but they don't have a customer care line for inquiries.
I urge everyone not to volunteer for this group. They will give your address out behind your back.  There is infighting in the organization, and plotting.  The annual fund raising ball proceeds are to substain the NYC office only.
All media awards are granted on nepotism  bases helping the glaad staff worker wished to social climb up to in NYC  leading too finer employments with high salaries.
I have been mis informed about every issue glaad stands for. The organization is basicly silly and not needed.
It is common sence to speak well of any minority, making glaad redundant.
I say..black list this ridiculous organization.
They like to play evil high school with people to their amusment.

Please avoid glaad . Do your own research and you will be glad to avoid glaad.
